div.h2: Camera Image Quality Engineer - Camera Hardware

li.title: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Camera Hardware Engineering group is responsible for all research, design, development, test, and qualification of camera hardware for Apple products. This team is seeking an exceptional Camera Image Quality Engineer with responsibilities for ongoing evaluation, benchmarking and characterization of Apple camera products.

ul.li: Strong knowledge of Image Sensor operation and tuning
Thorough understanding of image quality metrics and evaluation methodology
Strong Matlab programming skills on digital image processing and data analysis
Ideal candidates will also have familiarity with Python programming

Familiarity with megapixel CMOS image sensor technology, lens selection and qualification, implementation of camera systems in mobile products, and be familiar with imaging algorithms (auto-exposure, auto white balance, auto-focus, ...etc.)
Experience with objective camera bench testing and subjective image quality analysis.
Familiarity with camera components and functions
Support design team through iterative testing and ongoing support from early prototype to product launch.

div.p: Developing/performing lab type testing and software for camera evaluation Development of imager test techniques Optimization in imager sensor settings Optimization of ISPs Design/support of production line testing setups Performing testing/data analysis on benchmark products Delivering executive level presentations of results
MS/PhD in Electrical Engineering or equivalent
Travel to both Apple and suppliers' facilities will be required for production bring up. Experience with mobile communication products is an advantage.
